data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio de Sao Luis have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Throw-in for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
In the minute 4, Farense have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Eduardo Mancha scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio de Sao Luis.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
In the minute 6, Andre Narciso awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Farense to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 10, Famalicao have a goal kick.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a throw-in for Famalicao, close to Farense's area.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Farense needs to be cautious. Famalicao have an attacking throw-in.
Farense are coming forward and Nikola Stojiljkovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Farense.
Famalicao's Srdan Babic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 18, Throw-in high up the field for Farense in Faro.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
In the minute 25, Farense drive upfield and Amine Oudrhiri gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Famalicao defender.
Corner awarded to Farense.
In the minute 25, Goal! Farense extend their lead to 2-0 through Cesar.
Ryan Gauld instrumental with a fine assist.
Famalicao have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 28, Ruben Lameiras (Famalicao) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
In the minute 31, Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense.
Farense's Jonatan Lucca breaks free at Estadio de Sao Luis. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 33, Famalicao have a goal kick.
In Faro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Eduardo Mancha's header is off-target for Farense.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Free kick Famalicao.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
In the minute 40, Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 44, Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Farense.
Free kick in a good position for Famalicao!
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Alex Pinto is booked for the home team.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Joao Pedro Sousa is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de Sao Luis with Gil Dias replacing Joaquin Pereyra.
Joao Pedro Sousa (Famalicao) is making a second substitution, with Marcello Trotta replacing Dyego Sousa.
Ivan Jaime is replacing Calvin Verdonk for Famalicao at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 47, Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Andre Narciso signals a Famalicao throw-in in Farense's half.
Throw-in Farense.
In the minute 48, Andre Narciso awards the home team a throw-in.
Andre Narciso awards the home team a throw-in.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Farense.
At Estadio de Sao Luis, Eduardo Mancha has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Famalicao's Jordao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 51, Andre Narciso awards Farense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Farense.
The home team replace Alex Pinto with Miguel Bandarra.
The home team have replaced Hugo Seco with Brian Mansilla. This is the first substitution made today by Sergio Vieira.
In the minute 56, Farense's Brian Mansilla gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Sao Luis. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
In the minute 59, Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
In the minute 60, Ruben Lameiras for Famalicao drives towards goal at Estadio de Sao Luis. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
In the minute 61, Edwin Herrera for Famalicao has been booked by Andre Narciso and receives a first yellow card.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
The home team have replaced Nikola Stojiljkovic with Patrick. This is the third substitution made today by Sergio Vieira.
In the minute 63, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense.
Penalty! Andre Narciso points to the spot, great chance for Famalicao...
In the minute 65, Ruben Lameiras keeps Famalicao in contention with a penalty, making the score 2-1.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 69, Andre Narciso awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 71, In Faro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Pedro Sousa (Famalicao) is making a fourth substitution, with Jhonata Robert replacing Fernando Valenzuela.
In the minute 73, Goal! Ruben Lameiras levels the match at 2-2.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Farense.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 77, Famalicao's Ruben Lameiras misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
In Faro Famalicao attack through Jordao. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Jordao is on target to give Famalicao a 2-3 advantage.
Joao Pedro Sousa is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio de Sao Luis with Andrija Lukovic replacing Jordao.
In the minute 84, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Farense just outside Famalicao's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Faro.
Madi Queta is replacing Fabricio Isidoro for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 86, Claudio Falcao is replacing Jonatan Lucca for the home team.
Free kick Farense.
In the minute 88, Free kick Farense.
Edwin Herrera in Famalicao has been yellow-carded a second time by Andre Narciso and is being sent off.
Corner awarded to Farense.
Can Farense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Famalicao's half?
Andre Narciso awards Famalicao a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Faro.
Famalicao are in shooting range from this free kick.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In Faro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
That's full-time at Estadio de Sao Luis. The final score is 3-3.
Brian Mansilla levels the score at 3-3.
